I have an openvz server doing SFA. Plan runs out in 9 days. I Would like to test a server KVM/Xen HVM in the UK/Europe if someone wants to swap for my server for next 9 days (runs out on 5 June) . So if someone wants to use it for the next 9 days, let me know. I'd like to test your from 1 June for 7 days. Mine is available immediately. 

If no one wants to swap, someone can kill it for free from Wednesday 29th 2100 UK time onwards.....
